attributes.action: Hold ministers accountable when they brake ministerial code.
attributes.additional_details:
I feel that the government is not transparent enough and is getting away with far to much without facing up to consequences of their actions.

If a minister breaks ministerial code then they should be forced to resign.
attributes.background: I want all ministers to be held accountable and be forced to face the consequences of their actions if they break ministerial code.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561476
